abstract: Chrysler reaches tentative agreement with United Automobile Workers that will add 2,100 jobs in United States, while paying smaller bonuses to hourly workers than competitors are paying.
snippet: The smallest of the Detroit automakers early Wednesday tentatively agreed with the U.A.W. on a contract that would add 2,100 jobs.
lead_paragraph: The smallest of the Detroit automakers early Wednesday tentatively agreed with the U.A.W. on a contract that would add 2,100 jobs.

headline.main: Chrysler Is Last to Reach Deal With Union
headline.print_headline: Chrysler Is Last to Reach Deal With Autoworkers
headline.seo: Chrysler Is Last to Reach Deal With Union
